artist: Designer: Larsen Design Studio, New York; Designer: Anthony Ballatore; Mill: Griswold Textile Print, Inc.; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Vigorous pattern of tropical foliage printed on 2-1 twill fabric. Vert. Rpt 41.5". Printed on a 2-1 twill. Vertical lines of leaves in dark blue, and dark green. Pattern repeat 41.75" vertical. Ultramarine, cobalt and atlantic blue
image_copyright: © Jack Lenor Larsen%2C Inc.%2C Larsen Design Studio
medium: Mohair, cotton, rayon; hand screenprint; dyed
text:
A garden is not always flowers and often vines can be used very effectively to create variations and transitions in garden design.
Although flowers have been a popular figural element within the textile design world they were often thought trivial by those favoring a modernist aesthetic. Here the design emphasizes a relationship to nature and growing things and thus makes the connection to the ever-popular theme.
title: August
